site_name: D D FARM ANIMAL SANCTUARY AND RESCUE
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This was a focused inspection of the "direct" non-compliant item cited under 2.40 (b)((2) which was included on the
report for the inspection conducted on May 3, 2016. The female wolf had been seen by a veterinarian. In addition, a
treatment plan had been documented and signed by a veterinarian for the adult female tiger named "Honey".
The inspection and exit interview were conducted with Dr. Erika Leisner (VMO), Dr. Amanda Owens (VMO) and the
licensee.
Additional Inspectors
Owens Amanda, Veterinary Medical Officer

species.common: GRAY WOLF / GREY WOLF / TIMBER WOLF
